statements.select:
/* ValvFacMap.SelectValvFacList 변류시설 목록*/
WITH C AS ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS ROWCNT FROM INFOFMS.WTL_VALV_PS A WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE#
A.FTR_IDN like #FTR_IDN# || '%'
A.FTR_CDE= #FTR_CDE#
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.IST_YMD >= #IST_YMD_FROM#
A.IST_YMD <= #IST_YMD_TO#
A.VAL_MOF = #VAL_MOF#
A.VAL_MOP = #VAL_MOP#
A.VAL_DIP = #VAL_DIP#
A.VAL_FOR = #VAL_FOR#
)
SELECT C.ROWCNT, X.* FROM (
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.FTR_IDN DESC ) AS RN , A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250101' AND DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE ) AS MNG_NAM , A.IST_YMD , A.VAL_MOF , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250016' AND DTL_CD = A.VAL_MOF ) AS MOF_NAM , A.VAL_MOP , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250015' AND DTL_CD = A.VAL_MOP ) AS MOP_NAM , A.VAL_DIP , A.SAE_CDE , A.TRO_CNT , A.CRO_CNT , A.MTH_CDE , A.VAL_FOR , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250007' AND DTL_CD = A.VAL_FOR ) AS FOR_NAM , A.VAL_STD , A.VAL_SAF , A.PRD_NAM , A.PIP_CDE , A.PIP_IDN , A.CST_CDE , A.OFF_CDE , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , A.ANG_DIR , CASE WHEN ST_ISVALID(A.GEOM) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_GEOMETRY FROM INFOFMS.WTL_VALV_PS A WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE#
A.FTR_IDN like #FTR_IDN# || '%'
A.FTR_CDE= #FTR_CDE#
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.IST_YMD >= #IST_YMD_FROM#
A.IST_YMD <= #IST_YMD_TO#
A.VAL_MOF = #VAL_MOF#
A.VAL_MOP = #VAL_MOP#
A.VAL_DIP = #VAL_DIP#
A.VAL_FOR = #VAL_FOR#
ORDER BY FTR_IDN DESC
) X JOIN C ON 1=1 WHERE RN <= ($page$+1) * $rows$ AND RN >= ($page$) * $rows$ + 1

/* ValvFacMap.SelectValvFacDtl 변류시설 상세정보*/
SELECT A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250101' AND DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE ) AS MNG_NAM , A.IST_YMD , A.VAL_MOF , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250016' AND DTL_CD = A.VAL_MOF ) AS MOF_NAM , A.VAL_MOP , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250007' AND DTL_CD = A.VAL_MOP) AS MOP_NAM , A.VAL_DIP , A.SAE_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250015' AND DTL_CD = A.SAE_CDE) AS SAE_NAM , A.TRO_CNT , A.CRO_CNT , A.MTH_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250065' AND DTL_CD = A.MTH_CDE) AS MTH_NAM , VAL_FOR , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250007' AND DTL_CD = A.VAL_FOR ) AS FOR_NAM , A.VAL_STD , A.VAL_SAF , A.PRD_NAM , A.PIP_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.PIP_CDE) AS PIP_NAM , A.PIP_IDN , A.CST_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250062' AND DTL_CD = A.CST_CDE ) AS CST_NAM , A.OFF_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250036' AND DTL_CD = A.OFF_CDE ) AS OFF_NAM , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , decode(A.SYS_CHK,'1','유','무') as SYS_CHK_NAM , A.ANG_DIR FROM INFOFMS.WTL_VALV_PS A WHERE 1=1 AND FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
statements.update: INSERT INTO INFOFMS.WTL_VALV_PS ( FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , HJD_CDE , SHT_NUM , MNG_CDE , IST_YMD , VAL_MOF , VAL_MOP , VAL_DIP , SAE_CDE , TRO_CNT , CRO_CNT , MTH_CDE , VAL_FOR , VAL_STD , VAL_SAF , PRD_NAM , PIP_CDE , PIP_IDN , CST_CDE , OFF_CDE , CNT_NUM , SYS_CHK , ANG_DIR ) VALUES ( #FTR_CDE# , #FTR_IDN# , #HJD_CDE# , #SHT_NUM# , #MNG_CDE# , #IST_YMD# , #VAL_MOF# , #VAL_MOP# , #VAL_DIP# , #SAE_CDE# , #TRO_CNT# , #CRO_CNT# , #MTH_CDE# , #VAL_FOR# , #VAL_STD# , #VAL_SAF# , #PRD_NAM# , #PIP_CDE# , #PIP_IDN# , #CST_CDE# , #OFF_CDE# , #CNT_NUM# , #SYS_CHK# , #ANG_DIR# )

/* 변류시설 상세 수정 */ UPDATE INFOFMS.WTL_VALV_PS SET HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE# , SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM# , MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE# , IST_YMD = #IST_YMD# , VAL_MOF = #VAL_MOF# , VAL_MOP = #VAL_MOP# , VAL_DIP = #VAL_DIP# , SAE_CDE = #SAE_CDE# , TRO_CNT = #TRO_CNT# , CRO_CNT = #CRO_CNT# , MTH_CDE = #MTH_CDE# , VAL_FOR = #VAL_FOR# , VAL_STD = #VAL_STD# , VAL_SAF = #VAL_SAF# , PRD_NAM = #PRD_NAM# , PIP_CDE = #PIP_CDE# , PIP_IDN = #PIP_IDN# , CST_CDE = #CST_CDE# , OFF_CDE = #OFF_CDE# , CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM# , SYS_CHK = #SYS_CHK# , ANG_DIR = #ANG_DIR# WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#

MERGE INTO INFOFMS.WTL_VALV_PS USING DUAL ON (FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#)
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE# , SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM# , MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE# , IST_YMD = #IST_YMD# , VAL_MOF = #VAL_MOF# , VAL_MOP = #VAL_MOP# , VAL_DIP = #VAL_DIP# , SAE_CDE = #SAE_CDE# , TRO_CNT = #TRO_CNT# , CRO_CNT = #CRO_CNT# , MTH_CDE = #MTH_CDE# , VAL_FOR = #VAL_FOR# , VAL_STD = #VAL_STD# , VAL_SAF = #VAL_SAF# , PRD_NAM = #PRD_NAM# , PIP_CDE = #PIP_CDE# , PIP_IDN = #PIP_IDN# , CST_CDE = #CST_CDE# , OFF_CDE = #OFF_CDE# , CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM# , SYS_CHK = #SYS_CHK# , ANG_DIR = #ANG_DIR#
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , HJD_CDE , SHT_NUM , MNG_CDE , IST_YMD , VAL_MOF , VAL_MOP , VAL_DIP , SAE_CDE , TRO_CNT , CRO_CNT , MTH_CDE , VAL_FOR , VAL_STD , VAL_SAF , PRD_NAM , PIP_CDE , PIP_IDN , CST_CDE , OFF_CDE , CNT_NUM , SYS_CHK , ANG_DIR ) VALUES ( #FTR_CDE# , #FTR_IDN# , #HJD_CDE# , #SHT_NUM# , #MNG_CDE# , #IST_YMD# , #VAL_MOF# , #VAL_MOP# , #VAL_DIP# , #SAE_CDE# , #TRO_CNT# , #CRO_CNT# , #MTH_CDE# , #VAL_FOR# , #VAL_STD# , #VAL_SAF# , #PRD_NAM# , #PIP_CDE# , #PIP_IDN# , #CST_CDE# , #OFF_CDE# , #CNT_NUM# , #SYS_CHK# , #ANG_DIR# )
/* 변류시설 상세 삭제 */ DELETE INFOFMS.WTL_VALV_PS WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
